import axios from'axios';const API_URL="http://localhost:3000";// Ajustar según entorno
export const getTareas=()=>axios.get(`${API_URL}/tareas`);export const crearTarea=data=>axios.post(`${API_URL}/tareas`,data);export const editarTarea=(id,data)=>axios.put(`${API_URL}/tareas/${id}`,data);export const eliminarTarea=id=>axios.delete(`${API_URL}/tareas/${id}`);
